name: Baja Ceviche Tostadas
description: Vegan Baja Ceviche Tostadas, hearts of palm, cucumber, onion, tomato, cilantro, jalapeño, and carrots are marinated in lime juice and a splash of olive oil. Served Baja California style on corn tostadas slathered with mayo, and topped with avocado and hot sauce.
recipeIngredient: 2 cans (14 oz.) Hearts of palm, drained, rinsed ( finely chopped)
3  Plum tomatoes (cut in half, pulp removed, cut into small dice)
2 tbsp. Primal Kitchen Extra Virgin Olive Oil
Primal Kitchen Jalapeño and Lime Mayonnaise

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl combine the hearts of palm, tomato, white onion, jalapeño, carrots, cucumber, cilantro, pickled jalapeño brine, lime juice, and extra virgin olive oil. Season with salt and pepper to taste, and mix to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl combine the hearts of palm, tomato, white onion, jalapeño, carrots, cucumber, cilantro, pickled jalapeño brine, lime juice, and extra virgin olive oil. Season with salt and pepper to taste, and mix to combine.

recipeInstructions.text: Place in the fridge for at least 30 min.
recipeInstructions.name: Place in the fridge for at least 30 min.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread your tostadas with mayo, top with ceviche, avocado slices, and hot sauce. Serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread your tostadas with mayo, top with ceviche, avocado slices, and hot sauce. Serve immediately.

keywords: baja ceviche, vegan ceviche, vegan seafood, vegan tostadas
